name: Miriam
desc: Adopted daughter of House Renald. Cares for all in her realm, but still desires to find her true purpose.

name: Amaya
desc: Former noblewoman of Omyrus, now a loyal retainer to Lady Miriam of Oestridel. She holds a strong desire to repay her debt to General Jethro.

name: Dalton
desc: The prince of Renais. He is a man of great honour and bravery.

name: Serena
desc: Miriam's former retainer promoted to Captainn of the guard. Miriam looks up to her as a mentor.

name: Leiland
desc: Heir to House Renald and adoptive brother of Miriam. He dotes on her, but is stern with his duty.

name: Kasuto
desc: A sister serving in the Church of Gaeya. She is a fountain of wisdom and beauty.

name: Dehren
desc: A skilled mage from a far away land. Having resided in Oestridel for some time, he became a retainer for Lady Miriam.

name: Yarda
desc: A sincere, honest, and honourable pegasus knight of Frelia.

name: Thanya
desc: A mature priest of Frelia. He's gentle and reassuring.

name: Magne
desc: A young villager. He longs to be a warrior, like his father.

name: Shayala
desc: Crown Princess of the Kingdom of Masa.

name: Shane
desc: A young monk from Renais. He is a very forthright and pious man.

name: Morgaine
desc: A young mage of Renais. She believes she is a prodigy.

name: Baask
desc: A steadfast and honourable cavalier in sworn service to Renais.

name: Galahn
desc: A villager from Renais. He was once a feared military leader.

name: Myleih
desc: A cavalier from Renais. He is skilled, but reckless. He’s Franz’s brother.

name: Jan
desc: A wandering sword fighter from Jehanna. He loves to gamble.

name: Florina
desc: A young lady of Frelia. She is both cheery and sociable.

name: Amelia
desc: A young girl from a small village in Grado. She is honest and sincere.

name: Innes
desc: The prince of Frelia. He’s brash and arrogant, but good at heart.

name: Gerik
desc: A mercenary leader from Jehanna. He's better known as the Desert Tiger.

name: Tethys
desc: A beautiful and charming dancer from Jehanna.

name: Marisa
desc: An aloof sword fighter from Jehanna. She’s known as the Crimson Flash.

name: L'arachel
desc: A young woman from Rausten. She fights for justice and honour.

name: Dozla
desc: A berserker from Rausten. He’s a hearty man with a thirst for life.

name: Saleh
desc: A sage from the village Caer Pelyn. He’s Ewan’s solemn, but kind, teacher.

name: Ewan
desc: A sage-in-training from Jehanna. He reveres his teacher, Saleh.

name: Cormag
desc: A wyvern knight of Grado. A gentle man, but a ferocious warrior.

name: Rennac
desc: A lazy, greedy, but exceptional fighter from the Republic of Carcino.

name: Duessel
desc: A courageous general in Grado’s army. He’s better known as Obsidian.

name: Garish
desc: A cavalier of Renais. He’s a devoted husband and a serene and quiet man.

name: O'Neill
desc: A troop leader in Grado's army.

name: Breguet
desc: Commander of a Grado military force.

name: Bone
desc: One of Bazba's henchmen.

name: Bazba
desc: The leader of Bazba's bandits.

name: Saar
desc:
Commander of Grado's border guard.
His loyalty is unshakable.
